CutSceneText.Text: Take extra care in this place, Daeva.
Things have reached a boiling point.
Kinquid... has long been my friend, but...
I can help, but only if you strike down Kinquid.
you must use the crater's energy.
The yellow smoke will neutralize... Kinquid's defenses against physical attacks.
The purple smoke will neutralize... his defenses against magical attacks.
He cannot be defeated without the crater's energy.
